name: dev-tools
description: App, that fetches air condition data from several sources and display it on map. Build on:  - node.js and express.js,  - cordova  - react (cra)

scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others  "cd front/_reactApp/ && node watch-files.js" "cd front/_reactApp/ && npm start" " cd backend/ && node index.js "
